hero.title: Hi! I'm Woo Jin.
hero.text: Full stack junior software engineer with a passion for problem solving

about.title: About Me
about.text: Hello! My name is Woo Jin and I have been building different types of web and mobile applications since I graduated. Listed below are some of the languages and technologies that I have experience using.

experience.title: Experience
experience.text: Since graduating from Korean Bible University in 2022, I've been developing various applications and sharpening my skills.

projects.title: Projects
projects.text: Here are a few of my favorite projects that I have built over the past few years!

hobbies.title: Hobbies
hobbies.text: Aside from making applications, these are the things that I enjoy to do for fun! Under each of them I have included my favorite achievements.
